wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: Ka fo naŋ tɔgele, ŋmɛyaare ane toɔle a toma.
wm-license-cc-conditions: A yi a sobie ama yuoŋ :
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Aseŋ ka fo tere emmuo naŋ senne,a wanne  sase-miri naŋ wullo o sobuo ane ka tɛgere kaŋ eɛ. Fo na baŋ eɛ lɛ yi lɛ na zaa fõõ naŋ boɔrɔ, kyɛ ka a ta e ŋa o soba la ko fo sori bee fo de tonne.
